verses.name: 2 Corinthians 12:5
verses.text: Of such an one will I glory: yet of myself I will not glory, but in mine infirmities.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 12:6
verses.text: For though I would desire to glory, I shall not be a fool; for I will say the truth: but now I forbear, lest any man should think of me above that which he seeth me to be, or that he heareth of me.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 12:7
verses.text: And lest I should be exalted above measure through the abundance of the revelations, there was given to me a thorn in the flesh, the messenger of Satan to buffet me, lest I should be exalted above measure.
